meanings.sent1: The prongs of the fork were sharp.
meanings.sent2: She used the prongs of the comb to untangle her hair.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel balanced on the prongs of the fence.
meanings.sent4: His words had the prongs of truth that pierced through the lies.
meanings.sent5: The prongs of the crown gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A slender pointed or projecting part
meanings.sent1: The prongs of the star were delicate.
meanings.sent2: The prongs of the cactus were sharp to touch.
meanings.sent3: The tiny bird perched on the prongs of the branch.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had the prongs of joy that lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The prongs of the compass pointed northward.

meanings.sent1: The prongs of the trident gleamed in the water.
meanings.sent2: He used the prongs of the barbecue fork to flip the meat.
meanings.sent3: The magician waved the wand with prongs, creating sparks.
meanings.sent4: Her decision had the prongs of consequences that led to unexpected outcomes.
meanings.sent5: The prongs of the tuning fork vibrated with a clear tone.
